Container.Name: MESH-AI
Container.Overview: Off-Grid AI + Mesh Router for Meshtastic - Seamlessly connect LM Studio, Ollama, OpenAI, 3rd-party APIs, and Home Assistant to your LoRa mesh. Supports custom commands, Twilio SMS (inbound/outbound), Discord channel routing, and GPS emergency alerts via SMS, email, or Discord.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: mesh ai lora meshtastic llm local language model offline sms discord gps emergency alert
Container.Requires: Requires multiple files to exist prior to starting the container. Run `touch FILE_NAME` for all files listed here: See configuration details: https://github.com/mr-tbot/mesh-ai/blob/main/docker-compose.yml [br] Expects a `config.json` file to be mounted at `/app/config.json` before starting the container. See configuration details: https://github.com/mr-tbot/mesh-ai#configuration
